articles.description: Laughs across the stamina-sapping telethon were few and far between - if only they'd let Stephen Fry swear
articles.content: As one Twitter wag noted, it was a night to turn on the TV and spare a thought for those less funny than ourselves. Welcome to Comic Relief (BBC One and BBC Two): probably not worth watching, definit… [+2033 chars]

articles.author: Jack Wright
articles.title: Ukraine war: Famous stage actress is killed in Russian rocket attack - Daily Mail
articles.description: News of Oksana Shvets' death after her Kyiv flat was attacked by Russian forces was confirmed by the Young Theatre, a Ukrainian theatre company she had previously been working with.
articles.content:
One of Ukraines most famous stage actresses has been killed in a Russian rocket attack while she slept in an apartment in southeast Kyiv.
News of Oksana Shvets death was confirmed by the Young Theat… [+13204 chars]
